name: Archer Pharaoh
description:
Funny Mysterious Pharaonic Game.

an Archer Pharaoh hunting some Mummies, Coffins and Scarabs.

ARROW AND BOW GAME STYLE

Don't waste the valuable, strong and long range Arrows on close and easy targets, keep them for guarding stones, mummies reproducer coffins and far and hidden mummies.

Play for free and donate if you would like to support the game developer to give him the opportunity to make more funny and free games in the future.
